title: everyone talking about kappadin garen ekko morde but noone talks about sylas
body:

I've actually seen several threads talking about Sylas.

The patch notes are funny. "Sylas has been difficult to stabilize for all brackets of players and has an extremely long record of changes since his release." Um, duh, like anyone didn't predict that the _instant_ we learned that his ult was stealing enemies' ults. Anyone except Riot, I guess. "Omnistone continues to significantly underperform," like it's a surprise that having a suboptimal keystone 90% of the time is kinda weak. Like, surprisedpikachu.jpg much? I'm almost expecting to see a "/s" after some of these context notes.
